alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 01 at 4:51AM AKST until January 02 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting 50 to 60 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 PM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow will reduce visibility to one quarter mile or less at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and worst conditions will occur Monday morning.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.
